name: Last Lad
description:
Last Lad is a fast-paced shooter low-res game!

A Dangerous Ship is Heading Towards Earth! You must succeed in your mission!

It is our entry for the #lowrezjam 2017!

It is also a collaboration with my friend, (I'm helping him in starting his gamedev journey.)

Controls:

W - jump

A,D - move left,right

I,J,L - shoot up,left,right

Q - activate shield

R - reload

Dont forget to follow me and Waldo
